selection1.name:
“If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score?”
― Vince Lombardi

“Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark.”
― Amit Ray

“I can’t believe I’ve missed this sport. It’s all about fingering holes and caressing balls.”
― K.A. Mitchell

“The minute you hesitate you are in trouble.”
― Steve Waugh

“Tennis is the loneliest sport”
― Andre Agassi

“I am not designed to come second
or third, I am designed
to win.”
― Ayrton Senna
